name: mazapan
description:
mazapan

Move around your room and drag the necessary objects to pack your suitcase! Then click to rotate the 2D objects and drag them to fit them in the suitcase.

This is a short prototype of a puzzle mobile game designed to be procedural.

Credits:

ignaciopinyas: 3D assets and sound design

gonzalo: 3D assets

beityu: 2D art

adri: gameplay programming

fenshan: puzzle programming
